evals.name: basic-survey-with-url
evals.prompt: 帮我填写这个问卷 https://www.wjx.cn/vm/example
evals.expected_output: Skill should analyze the survey structure, ask for configuration (fill count, probability strategy), and then proceed with filling.

evals.name: survey-with-count
evals.prompt: 用这个工具填写10份问卷 https://www.wjx.cn/vm/example2
evals.expected_output: Skill should analyze survey, ask for probability configuration, and fill 10 times.

evals.name: casual-request
evals.prompt: 我有一个问卷链接，能帮我批量填写吗？链接是 https://www.wjx.cn/vm/test
evals.expected_output: Skill should recognize this as a survey auto-fill request and proceed with analysis.
